column5: Recently i started a silly little thread that, in retrospect, should never have been posted on this forum.At the time,and in my mind, it was intended to lighten the atmosphere a bit on the board. I realize now, that to a potential new member, or a possible new paying sponsor, it could have given a negative image of this community. Not only that, but i now know that it has probably made many of you think that i am a total idiot. Please know that i am not.I may have a misguided sense of humor at times and a very vivid imagination, but i am no idiot. I have been known to suffer from foot in mouth disease on occasion, but that is something i am constatly working to be cured of. If you see me getting that way again, just send me a PM and politely tell me to "cool it", i will understand immediately  I sincerely appologize to the members and moderators of OFC who were offended by that thread. I will try not to let a similar situation arise in the future.  Paul
you did what with a fish?!?!?!?!

What was the thread about Paul???  Don't let the  animals get you during Winternet, they piss and moan about the stupidist things at times here... yet fail to look at some of their own posts/comments that are worse than what they are beating you for.

Ok Paul since you apologized for Lew's post earlier today I will stay around here and not go to the site that does not like to eat fish because fish feel pain or what ever other crap they write on them sings that left 4 birds,two squirrel, 1 big fat raccoon and a skunk homeless but non the less they do make nice signs with that wood.  Sorry i was thinking with the wrong side of my head hope it made ya feel a little bit better to know your not the only one off the rocker around here.
Well, I am only gonna give you 6754392 more chances, and then YOUR OUTTA HERE!
Thank goodness. I thought you were being serious about the dog thing.
Me, I cannot wait for the snow and ice to go so I can get out and do this again...  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8-x-NiiedjM
Dog ear wax is awesome on dry toast.	'nuff said.
Been her many times before but here ya go again
i really really really really hope we get a chance to meet someday Solo.......
Will you quit apologizing? You're making everyone who needs to apologize feel bad.
But Art said I'm in the good 95%...
don't sweat it Paul I new you were joking
Thanks everyone , after the sting of being slammed wore off, i understood what the fuss was about. Again, no harm intended.  Paul  Now back to you previously scheduled show
It's about time you lightened up!   Welcome back! lol
Oh sure, now I want to know what I missed....darn.Im sure it must have been good

hey mrrcman thanks for your sudjestion on my fathers tackle.   not realy shure what this is all about. but i hope its got nothing to do with me.  just trying to figure this out?  new guy.  (kinda like being a minnow in a swarm of hungry musky) like that exist.	???
Apology accepted. By the way I have done the same thing to dogs only I use my ear wax.  Cats love it too.  I know it is weird but hey, so am I. PS, I haven't done that to a dog or cat for years.
nothing to do with you dude my pleasure btw

You mean he wasn't serious.....I almost bought a dog this week to try that out but the deal fell through.....now I don't have to...  BTW I thought the post was funny and entertaining and anyone who was upset by it needs to be evaluated....  P.S. Love means never having to say you're sorry....
That would be me!
